response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and offers unparalleled value. Given its significance to both of us, I believe it's worth discussing. Considering its immense worth to you, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This special offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing me to maintain a fair profit. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Let's make this opportunity work for both of us.", "product_price": 9500}
